alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; East Polk; Lake Of The Woods; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake; Roseau; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:46PM CST until December 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TUESDAY TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze through Wednesday morning. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northwest Minnesota. * WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. Heaviest snowfall rates will be during the day Tuesday into Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Additional 2 to 3 inches of snow, freezing drizzle, and blowing snow are expected through the rest of Wednesday and Thursday. This could prolong impacts beyond Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
